verses.verse: Thus the Lord<WH136> Yahweh<WH3069> showed<WH7200> me:<WH3335> and behold, he formed locusts<WH1462> in the beginning<WH8462> of the shooting up<WH5927> of the latter growth;<WH3954> and behold,<WH3954> it was the latter growth after<WH310> the king<WH4428>'s harvest.<WH1488>

It happened that,<WH3615> when they made an end of eating<WH398> the grass<WH6212> of the land,<WH776> then I said,<WH559> "Lord<WH136> Yahweh,<WH136> forgive,<WH5545> I beg you!<WH3290> How could Jacob stand?<WH6965> For he is small.<WH6996>"
Yahweh<WH3068> relented<WH5162> concerning this.<WH559> "It shall not be," says Yahweh.<WH3068>

Thus the Lord<WH136> Yahweh<WH3069> showed<WH7200> me and behold,<WH136> the Lord Yahweh<WH3069> called<WH7121> for judgment<WH7378> by fire;<WH784> and it dried<WH398> up the great<WH7227> deep,<WH8415> and would have devoured<WH398> the land.<WH2506>
Then I said,<WH559> "Lord<WH136> Yahweh,<WH3069> stop,<WH2308> I beg you!<WH3290> How could Jacob stand?<WH6965> For he is small.<WH6996>"
Yahweh<WH3068> relented<WH5162> concerning this.<WH559> "This also shall not be," says the Lord<WH136> Yahweh.<WH3069>
Thus he showed<WH7200> me and behold,<WH136> the Lord stood<WH5324> beside a wall<WH2346> made by a plumb line,<WH594> with a plumb line<WH594> in his hand.<WH3027>

Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to me,<WH5986> "370, what do you see?<WH7200>" I said,<WH559> "A plumb line.<WH594>" Then the Lord<WH136> said,<WH559> "Behold,<WH7760> I will set a plumb line<WH594> in the midst<WH7130> of my people<WH5971> Israel.<WH3478> I will not again<WH3254> pass by them any more.<WH5674>

The high places<WH1116> of Isaac<WH3446> will be desolate,<WH8074> the sanctuaries<WH4720> of Israel<WH3478> will be laid waste;<WH2717> and I will rise<WH6965> against the house<WH1004> of Jeroboam<WH3379> with the sword.<WH2719>"

Then Amaziah<WH558> the priest<WH3548> of Bethel<WH1008> sent<WH7971> to Jeroboam<WH3379> king<WH4428> of Israel,<WH3478> saying,<WH559> "370<WH5986> has conspired<WH7194> against you in the midst<WH7130> of the house<WH1004> of Israel.<WH3478> The land<WH776> is not able<WH3201> to bear<WH3557> all his words.<WH1697>
For Amos<WH5986> says,<WH559> <WH3379> 'Jeroboam will die<WH4191> by the sword,<WH2719> and Israel<WH3478> shall surely<WH1540> be led away captive<WH1540> out of his land.<WH127>'"

Amaziah<WH558> also said<WH559> to Amos,<WH5986> "You seer,<WH2374> go,<WH3212> flee away<WH1272> into the land<WH776> of Judah,<WH3063> and there eat<WH398> bread,<WH3899> and prophesy there:<WH5012>
but don't<WH5012> prophesy again<WH3254> any more at Bethel;<WH1008> for it is the king<WH4428>'s sanctuary,<WH4720> and it is a royal<WH4467> house!<WH1004>"

Then Amos<WH5986> answered<WH6030> Amaziah,<WH558> "I was no prophet,<WH5030> neither was I a prophet<WH5030>'s son;<WH1121> but I was a herdsman,<WH951> and a farmer<WH1103> of sycamore figs;<WH8256>
and Yahweh<WH3068> took<WH3947> me from following<WH310> the flock,<WH6629> and Yahweh<WH3068> said<WH559> to me,<WH3212> 'Go, prophesy<WH5012> to my people<WH5971> Israel.<WH3478>'

Now therefore listen<WH8085> to the word<WH1697> of Yahweh:<WH3068> <WH559> 'You say, Don't<WH5012> prophesy against Israel,<WH3478> and don't<WH5197> preach against the house<WH1004> of Isaac.<WH3446>'

Therefore thus says<WH559> Yahweh:<WH3068> <WH802> 'Your wife shall be a prostitute<WH2181> in the city,<WH5892> and your sons<WH1121> and your daughters<WH1323> shall fall<WH5307> by the sword,<WH2719> and your land<WH127> shall be divided<WH2505> by line;<WH2256> and you yourself shall die<WH4191> in<WH5921> a land<WH127> that is unclean,<WH2931> and Israel<WH3478> shall surely<WH1540> be led away captive<WH1540> out of his land.<WH127>'"
